author: Retro Game Corps
description:
Let's try out emulation on the Lenovo Legion Go 2, focusing on its new chipset and that huge OLED screen.

Legion Go 2 review: https://youtu.be/9fm1TwxR_WE
Buy one here: More info: https://bestbuy.7tiv.net/YRz3oK

Emulation setup videos:
RetroBat: https://youtu.be/il_x_6mNjLQ
EmuDeck: https://youtu.be/05dunYi6hkY

Vertical grip adapter: https://www.etsy.com/listing/1653818331/lenovo-legion-go-tate-shmup-vertical
RPCS3 database: https://rpcs3.net/compatibility

This was a review unit sent to me on loan by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this video ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

title: Emulation on the Legion Go 2 (is Beautiful)
